sqlMap.select: SELECT A.PID , B.SUB_PID , A.APPLICATION ,F_GET_PID_STATUS_NM('RD_CATEGORY',A.RD_CATEGORY_CD) AS RND_CATEGROY_NM ,A.RD_THEME FROM HP1DM02T B , HP1DM01T A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PID = #PID# AND A.PID = B.PID AND B.SUB_PID = #SUB_PID#
SELECT A.APPLICATION FROM HP1DM01T A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PID = #SUB_PID#
SELECT 'P'|| LPAD(PID_SUBPID_SEQ.nextval,5,'0') AS SUB_PID , PID_SUBPID_SEQ.CURRVAL AS CNT FROM DUAL
sqlMap.insert: Insert into HP_DBA01.HP1DM02T (REGIST_TIME, REGIST_USER_ID, PID, SUB_PID) values(SYSDATE, #REGIST_USER_ID# , #PID# , #SUB_PID# )

Insert into HP_DBA01.HP1DM01T (REGIST_ORG_CD, OWNER_COMPANY_CD, REGIST_TIME, REGIST_USER_ID, REGIST_COMPANY_CD, PID, PID_STATUS_CD, APPLICATION, OWNER_ORG_CD) values(#REGIST_ORG_CD# , #OWNER_COMPANY_CD# , SYSDATE, #REGIST_USER_ID# , #REGIST_COMPANY_CD# , #PID# , #PID_STATUS_CD# , #APPLICATION# , #OWNER_ORG_CD# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT #PID# AS PID, A.PID AS SUB_PID, A.APPLICATION, F_GET_COMBO_NAME('OWNER_ORG_CD', A.OWNER_ORG_CD) AS OWNER_ORG_NM, A.REGIST_ORG_CD , (SELECT RD_THEME FROM HP1DM01T WHERE PID = #PID# ) AS RD_THEME FROM HP1DM01T A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PID = #SUB_PID#

SELECT PID ,F_GET_COMBO_NAME('STATUS_CD',PID_STATUS_CD) AS PID_STATUS_NM ,F_GET_COMBO_NAME('CATEGORY_CD',RD_CATEGORY_CD) AS RD_CATEGORY_NM ,PID_STATUS_CD ,RD_THEME ,ITEM_NAME ,NICKNAME ,NICKNAME_EXCL , (SELECT ORG_NM FROM HP1DM03T WHERE 1=1 AND ORG_LVL != '2' AND ORG_CD=REGIST_ORG_CD ) AS REGIST_ORG_NM ,(SELECT ORG_NM FROM HP1DM03T WHERE 1=1 AND ORG_LVL != '2' AND ORG_CD=OWNER_ORG_CD ) AS OWNER_ORG_NM ,REGIST_ORG_CD FROM HP1DM01T where 1=1 AND PID NOT IN (SELECT SUB_PID FROM HP1DM02T)
AND PID LIKE '%'|| #PID# || '%' AND PID_STATUS_CD = #PID_STATUS_CD# AND RD_CATEGORY_CD= #RD_CATEGORY_CD# AND RD_THEME LIKE '%'|| #RD_THEME# || '%' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%'|| #NICKNAME# || '%' AND ITEM_NAME LIKE '%'|| #ITEM_NAME# || '%' AND NICKNAME_EXCL LIKE '%'|| #NICKNAME_EXCL# || '%' AND OWNER_ORG_CD= #OWNER_ORG_CD# AND OWNER_COMPANY_CD= #OWNER_COMPANY_CD#
ORDER BY PID
